Trade/Device Name(s): BD Vacutainer® Trace Element K2EDTA Tubes
BD Vacutainer® Trace Element Serum Tubes
Specimen Container(s): BD Vacutainer® Trace Element Serum Tube
BD Vacutainer® Trace Element K2EDTA Tube
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Vacutainer Trace Element K2EDTA and Serum Tubes for collection and processing of venous blood specimens for trace element analysis.
Indications for Use Summary: Plastic, evacuated, sterile, single-use blood collection tubes for trace element testing (e.g., Arsenic, Cadmium, Chromium, Copper, Lead, Manganese, Mercury, Selenium, and Zinc) in venous blood specimens collected by trained healthcare professionals.
